name: ten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 the number 10: Her father died ten years ago. We can take ten (people) in the minibus.
More examplesFewer examplesLet's count out loud from one to ten.To divide by ten, move the decimal point one place to the left.Empty the soup into a saucepan and simmer gently for ten minutes.The boat is ten metres in length.Nine out of ten people said they liked the product.

10: The twins are ten. a ten-seat minivan
Ten can also mean ten o’clock.
